Title: Initialize iOS Project
Description:
Create new Xcode project with SwiftUI, configure app bundle ID, set minimum iOS version (iOS 15+)

**Ticket ID:** PROJ-001
**Dependencies:** None

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Project builds successfully
- App launches on simulator

Title: Set Up Project Structure
Description:
Create folder structure (Models, Views, ViewModels, Services, Utilities), set up MVVM architecture pattern

**Ticket ID:** PROJ-002
**Dependencies:** PROJ-001

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Clear folder structure exists
- MVVM pattern established

Title: Add EPUB Parsing Library
Description:
Research and integrate EPUB parsing library (e.g., ZIPFoundation + XMLParser, or FolioReaderKit), add to project dependencies

**Ticket ID:** PROJ-003
**Dependencies:** PROJ-001

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Library integrated
- Can parse EPUB file structure

Title: Implement EPUB File Import
Description:
Add Files app integration using UIDocumentPickerViewController to allow users to select EPUB files from Files app or iCloud Drive

**Ticket ID:** EPUB-001
**Dependencies:** PROJ-002

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- User can tap button to import EPUB
- File picker opens
- EPUB files are selectable

Title: Implement EPUB Storage
Description:
Save imported EPUB files to app's Documents directory, create file management service to handle file operations

**Ticket ID:** EPUB-002
**Dependencies:** EPUB-001

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- EPUB files are saved to Documents directory
- File paths are tracked

Title: Create EPUB Metadata Model
Description:
Create data model to store EPUB metadata (title, author, cover image, file path, import date)

**Ticket ID:** EPUB-003
**Dependencies:** PROJ-002

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Data model exists with all required fields

Title: Build Library View
Description:
Create main screen showing list of all imported EPUBs with cover images, titles, and authors

**Ticket ID:** EPUB-004
**Dependencies:** EPUB-002, EPUB-003

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Library view displays all imported EPUBs
- Shows cover/title/author
- Is scrollable

Title: Implement EPUB Parsing Service
Description:
Create service to parse EPUB files, extract chapters, extract text content, handle EPUB structure (OPF, NCX, HTML content)

**Ticket ID:** EPUB-005
**Dependencies:** PROJ-003, EPUB-002

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Can parse EPUB structure
- Extract chapters
- Extract readable text content

Title: Create Reader View Controller
Description:
Build basic reader view using SwiftUI or UIKit to display EPUB content, handle scrolling

**Ticket ID:** READ-001
**Dependencies:** EPUB-005

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Reader view displays EPUB content
- User can scroll through text

Title: Implement Chapter Navigation
Description:
Add ability to navigate between chapters, show chapter list, jump to specific chapter

**Ticket ID:** READ-002
**Dependencies:** READ-001

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- User can see chapter list
- Can navigate to any chapter

Title: Implement Text Styling
Description:
Apply readable font, font size, line spacing, and text color to reader view

**Ticket ID:** READ-003
**Dependencies:** READ-001

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Text is readable with appropriate styling
- Font size is reasonable

Title: Add Search UI
Description:
Create search bar in reader view, add search input field and search button

**Ticket ID:** SEARCH-001
**Dependencies:** READ-001

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Search bar appears in reader view
- User can enter search text

Title: Implement Text Search
Description:
Search through EPUB content for entered string, find all occurrences

**Ticket ID:** SEARCH-002
**Dependencies:** SEARCH-001, READ-001

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Can search EPUB text
- Finds all matches
- Highlights results

Title: Implement Search Navigation
Description:
Allow user to navigate between search results, jump to each occurrence

**Ticket ID:** SEARCH-003
**Dependencies:** SEARCH-002

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- User can tap search result to jump to that location
- Can navigate next/previous

Title: Create Progress Data Model
Description:
Design data model to store reading progress (book ID, chapter index, position/offset, last read date)

**Ticket ID:** PROG-001
**Dependencies:** EPUB-003

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Progress model exists with all required fields

Title: Implement Progress Saving
Description:
Save reading position when user navigates or closes reader, store in UserDefaults or Core Data

**Ticket ID:** PROG-002
**Dependencies:** PROG-001, READ-001

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Reading position is saved when user leaves reader

Title: Implement Progress Restoration
Description:
Restore reading position when user opens EPUB, jump to last read location

**Ticket ID:** PROG-003
**Dependencies:** PROG-002

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- When opening EPUB, reader jumps to last read position

Title: Add Progress Indicator
Description:
Show visual indicator of reading progress (e.g., percentage, chapter indicator) in library and reader view

**Ticket ID:** PROG-004
**Dependencies:** PROG-002

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Progress indicator visible in library and reader

Title: Implement Sentence Detection
Description:
Parse EPUB text into sentences, identify sentence boundaries, create sentence data structure with text and position

**Ticket ID:** TTS-001
**Dependencies:** EPUB-005

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Can break EPUB text into individual sentences
- Each sentence has position info

Title: Integrate AVSpeechSynthesizer
Description:
Set up AVSpeechSynthesizer, configure voice settings, implement basic speak functionality

**Ticket ID:** TTS-002
**Dependencies:** PROJ-002

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Can synthesize speech from text string
- Audio plays

Title: Implement Tap-to-Read
Description:
Detect tap on sentence in reader view, start TTS from that sentence

**Ticket ID:** TTS-003
**Dependencies:** TTS-001, TTS-002, READ-001

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- User can tap sentence
- TTS starts reading from that sentence

Title: Add Play/Pause Controls
Description:
Create play/pause button, implement control logic to start/stop TTS

**Ticket ID:** TTS-004
**Dependencies:** TTS-003

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Play/pause button works
- Can start and stop TTS

Title: Implement Sentence Highlighting
Description:
Highlight current sentence being read during TTS playback

**Ticket ID:** TTS-005
**Dependencies:** TTS-003

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Current sentence is highlighted while being read

Title: Handle TTS Completion
Description:
Detect when sentence finishes, automatically move to next sentence, continue reading

**Ticket ID:** TTS-006
**Dependencies:** TTS-003

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- When sentence finishes, automatically starts next sentence

Title: Add Speed Control UI
Description:
Create UI control (slider or buttons) to adjust TTS playback speed (0.5x to 2.0x)

**Ticket ID:** TTS-007
**Dependencies:** TTS-004

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Speed control UI exists
- User can see current speed

Title: Implement Speed Adjustment
Description:
Apply speed setting to AVSpeechSynthesizer rate property, persist speed preference

**Ticket ID:** TTS-008
**Dependencies:** TTS-007, TTS-002

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Speed changes affect TTS playback
- Preference is saved

Title: Configure Audio Session
Description:
Set up AVAudioSession with .playback category, configure for background audio, handle interruptions

**Ticket ID:** BG-001
**Dependencies:** TTS-002

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Audio session configured
- Supports background playback

Title: Implement Background Audio Support
Description:
Ensure TTS continues playing when app goes to background or device is locked

**Ticket ID:** BG-002
**Dependencies:** BG-001, TTS-006

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- TTS continues playing when phone is locked or app backgrounded

Title: Add Lock Screen Controls
Description:
Implement MPNowPlayingInfoCenter to show book info and controls on lock screen

**Ticket ID:** BG-003
**Dependencies:** BG-002

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Lock screen shows book title
- Play/pause controls work

Title: Design Audio Queue System
Description:
Design architecture for pre-generating audio, queue management system, buffer strategy (3-5 sentences ahead)

**Ticket ID:** SEAMLESS-001
**Dependencies:** TTS-006

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Queue system architecture designed and documented

Title: Implement Audio Pre-generation
Description:
Pre-generate audio for upcoming sentences in background queue while current sentence plays

**Ticket ID:** SEAMLESS-002
**Dependencies:** SEAMLESS-001, TTS-001, TTS-002

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Audio for next 3-5 sentences is pre-generated while reading

Title: Implement Seamless Playback
Description:
Play pre-generated audio seamlessly, transition between sentences without gaps or delays

**Ticket ID:** SEAMLESS-003
**Dependencies:** SEAMLESS-002

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Sentences play seamlessly without noticeable gaps or delays

Title: Handle Queue Management
Description:
Manage audio queue, handle buffer underruns, refill queue as needed, handle user navigation (skip/jump)

**Ticket ID:** SEAMLESS-004
**Dependencies:** SEAMLESS-003

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Queue stays filled
- Handles navigation without breaking playback

Title: Optimize Memory Management
Description:
Ensure pre-generated audio doesn't consume excessive memory, implement cleanup for old audio files

**Ticket ID:** SEAMLESS-005
**Dependencies:** SEAMLESS-002

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Memory usage is reasonable
- Old audio is cleaned up

Title: Design App Icon
Description:
Create app icon for App Store submission

**Ticket ID:** UI-001
**Dependencies:** PROJ-001

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- App icon created and added to project

Title: Polish Reader UI
Description:
Improve reader UI aesthetics, ensure good readability, add proper spacing and margins

**Ticket ID:** UI-002
**Dependencies:** READ-003

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Reader UI looks polished and professional

Title: Add Loading States
Description:
Show loading indicators when importing EPUBs, parsing content, or generating audio

**Ticket ID:** UI-003
**Dependencies:** EPUB-001, EPUB-005, SEAMLESS-002

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Loading states shown for all async operations

Title: Add Error Handling
Description:
Handle and display errors for file import failures, parsing errors, TTS errors

**Ticket ID:** UI-004
**Dependencies:** EPUB-001, EPUB-005, TTS-002

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Errors are caught and displayed to user with helpful messages

Title: Implement Settings Screen
Description:
Create settings screen for TTS preferences (default speed, voice selection), app preferences

**Ticket ID:** UI-005
**Dependencies:** TTS-008

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Settings screen exists
- Can change TTS preferences
